game.name: Tomorrowness
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능
game.shortDescription: Take flight as Juno, a small bird guided by the sound of her guitar through a hand-drawn world of music and memory. Play melodies to solve puzzles, fly through unique platforming challenges and piece together a story of grief and love.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take flight as Juno, a small bird guided by the sound of her guitar through a hand-drawn world of music and memory. Play melodies to solve puzzles, fly through unique platforming challenges and piece together a story of grief and love.
